code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./NewNoteModal.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NewNoteModal(_ref){let{onClose,onSave}=_ref;const[noteText,setNoteText]=useState('');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"New Note"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:noteText,onChange:e=>setNoteText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Input your note here..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSave(noteText),children:"Apply"})]})]})});}export default NewNoteModal;
